db:abstract.db:para: A tool that scans QML files inside the directory for QML import dependencies.

db:section.db:title: qmlimportscanner
db:section.db:para: qmlimportscanner is an internal tool shipped with Qt Qml to scan QML files inside the directory for QML import dependencies. It is meant to be invoked by the build system only, users shouldn't need to execute it directly.
